mapper.select: select id, operater_type, operater_id, operater_name, operate_type, operate_detail, createtime from acountManagement.operation_log where id = #{id}
select id, operater_type, operater_id, operater_name, operate_type, operate_detail, createtime from acountManagement.operation_log limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into acountManagement.operation_log(operater_type, operater_id, operater_name, operate_type, operate_detail, createtime) values (#{operaterType}, #{operaterId}, #{operaterName}, #{operateType}, #{operateDetail}, #{createtime})

insert into acountManagement.operation_log(operater_type, operater_id, operater_name, operate_type, operate_detail, createtime) values
(#{entity.operaterType}, #{entity.operaterId}, #{entity.operaterName}, #{entity.operateType}, #{entity.operateDetail}, #{entity.createtime})

insert into acountManagement.operation_log(operater_type, operater_id, operater_name, operate_type, operate_detail, createtime) values
(#{entity.operaterType}, #{entity.operaterId}, #{entity.operaterName}, #{entity.operateType}, #{entity.operateDetail}, #{entity.createtime})
on duplicate key update operater_type = values(operater_type) , operater_id = values(operater_id) , operater_name = values(operater_name) , operate_type = values(operate_type) , operate_detail = values(operate_detail) , createtime = values(createtime)
mapper.update:
update acountManagement.operation_log
operater_type = #{operaterType},
operater_id = #{operaterId},
operater_name = #{operaterName},
operate_type = #{operateType},
operate_detail = #{operateDetail},
createtime = #{createtime},
where id = #{id}
